game.name: TaVRn's Takedown - Naheulbeuk
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 전용, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: TaVRn’s Takedown is a VR beat ‘em up from the world of Naheulbeuk’s Dungeon, developed by VR Studio LDLC. Punch enemies, break taverns, and fight for the fate of Mliuej… or just create total mayhem!
game.shortDescriptionEn: TaVRn’s Takedown is a VR beat ‘em up from the world of Naheulbeuk’s Dungeon, developed by VR Studio LDLC. Punch enemies, break taverns, and fight for the fate of Mliuej… or just create total mayhem!
